body: Just finished my first #marathon! Can’t believe I did it! #running #fitnessgoals

comments.body: That’s incredible! How do you feel?
@78787 Exhausted but so proud! My legs are definitely feeling it though.
Congrats! How long did it take you to finish?
@89898 Thanks! I finished in just under 4 hours. Honestly, faster than I expected!
You’re a marathoner now! What’s next? Another race?
@90909 Haha, maybe! But for now, I’m just looking forward to some well-deserved rest.
I’m so impressed! How did you train for it?
@12121 I followed a 16-week training plan, and it definitely helped build up my endurance. Consistency is key!
You’ve inspired me! I’ve been thinking about running a half marathon, but I’m nervous.
@34343 You should totally do it! Start small and work your way up—you’ll be amazed at what you can accomplish!
